text:
Gerard Unger (22 January 1942 – 23 November 2018) was a Dutch graphic and type designer.
Biography.
He was born in Arnhem, Netherlands. He worked at Total Design, Prad and Joh. Enschedé. In 1975, he became an independent developer. He was a long-time guest lecturer at the University of Reading, he mentored many modern typeface designers.
Unger died on 23 November 2018 in Bussum, Netherlands from stomach cancer at the age of 76.
